item.description:
Join Fellow NHCer Josh at this Networking Event:

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear in New Haven on Thursday, October 21, 2010. The event is from 5:30 â€“ 8:00. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials and Free Food, Black Bear will be providing, from 5:30 till 8:00:
$2 drafts (all 16)
and $2 well drinks.
Additionally, drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening.
Black Bear will also be providing an assortment of free food to all attendees.

Josh will be attending the event and can be contacted at (203)772-0070 if anyone has any questions.

You'll probably want to bring your buisness Cards if you have any.
item.name: Young Professionals Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear
